casebody.data:
City of Toledo et al., Appellees, v. The State of Ohio, Appellant.

[Cite as Toledo v. State, 122 Ohio St.3d 542, 2009-0hio-4117.]

(No. 2008-0975 Submitted July 14, 2009 Decided August 20, 2009.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Lima v. State, 122 Ohio St.3d 155, 2009-Ohio-2597, 909 N.E.2d 616.

*543Richard Cordray, Attorney General, Benjamin C. Mizer, Solicitor General, and Sharon A. Jennings and Pearl M. Chin, Assistant Attorneys General, for appellant. Kalniz, lorio & Feldstein Co., L.P.A., and Donato lorio, for amici curiae Toledo Police Patrolman’s Association and Toledo Fire Fighters Local 92 in support of appellant. Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents.
